official.headline: Compliance Review Update
official.anchor_line: Citywide BCI scoring is paused for an operational review to ensure reliable service for all residents.
official.contextual_reframing: Temporary adjustments demonstrate Stenograd's ongoing commitment to improved services and advanced civic management.

underground.headline: Compliance Grid Down
underground.anchor_line: BCI scoring's crashed — nobody can get clear answers, while chaos and delays hit housing, transit, and health services.
underground.contextual_reframing: Halden's death wasn't just a rumor — now the system’s breaking, secrets are leaking, and locked-out citizens are slipping through the cracks.
